name: Super BrickBreak
description:
This game is currently in development stage. Feel free to give feedback.

This game was originally written in Processing (Java), then ported to OficinaFramework/OpenGL (C++), and now completely ported to JavaScript, using a 2D canvas element. It is part of a collection of minigames that I once made.

While rather simple, this is a very complete game that isn't easy nor hard; it has a score system (complete with local storage of highscore), chain bonus multipliers, and bonus points for some actions.

Some interesting features you might enjoy:

  • A very fun breakout clone in HD (720p) and 60 FPS;
  • Full support for mouse, keyboard and gamepad;
  • Local storage of high scores;
  • Up to 20 levels of pure action!

Please enjoy and support me with your feedback.
